string.value: I better ask Agent #b#p1103004##k of #m102000000# about the new assignment.

#p1103004# told me something's not right in #b#m101030102##k, and wanted me to go there and eliminate #r#o2230110#s#k. After eliminating #r#o2230110##k, I also have to bring back #b#t4032146##k... 

#o2230110##r #a207221##k 
#i4032146# #t4032146# #b#c4032146# / 1#k
I was able to eliminate #o2230110#s and brought back #b#t4032146##k. #p1103004# had a serious look on his face while looking at the detector...

Oh, the detector works. Good thing it works well... but wait, why is it reacting like this...? Um, I'm sorry to tell you this since you just arrived, but I need you to get involved in this assignment immediately! The detector is reacting! \n#b#L0#What is this detector for?#l\n#k
This detector #rdetects forces of darkness connected to the puppeteer#k. Since the detector is reacting, that means the puppeteer is planning something nearby! \n#b#L0#Where's the location?#l\n#k

The location: #b#m101030102##k! I have a feeling the puppeteer is trying to control #o2230110#! Please go there and slay those #o2230110#s! I need you to slay about a 1,000 of them...\n#b#L0#1,000???#l\n#k
Please defeat #r200 #o2230110#s#k and bring back #b#t4032146##k! If it's the puppeteer's deed, then I am sure we'll be able to recover #t4032146# as well. Good luck!
Is... that too much? But we need to slay at least 200...

Wow, you were able to defeat all the #o2230110#s and retrieve the doll as well! Thank goodness this was working, but still.. Once is not enough. No, no, it's nothing. I'll let you know if I find something peculiar with the detector.
I don't think you have defeated #r200 #o2230110#s#k and brought back #b#t4032146##k yet. I need you to go to #b#m101030102##k and complete the assignment immediately!

I don't think you have defeated #r200 #o2230110#s#k and brought back #b#t4032146##k yet. I need you to go to #b#m101030102##k and complete the assignment immediately! Otherwise, this may get out of hand!
